root.name: Lucius
root.description: OverviewLucius is puzzle horror game where you play as a young boy who is the son of the Devil. As Lucius, it is the player's role to rid the inhabitants of a mansion without anyone suspecting Lucius.This is the first project from Finnish based Shiver Games; the game was released for PC on October 26, 2012 via Steam and GOG.StoryLucius was born on June 6th in 1966, and on his sixth birthday, he showed signs of his true origin.The mansion is filled with secrets that paint a picture behind the family and it's foul history. You will take control of Lucius and many of the other occupants to uncover these secrets and clear the mansion of it's residents.GameplayAs Lucius, you have to cleverly devise accidents from simple household items to rid the residents from the mansion. Every time he succeeds he will gain supernatural abilities to move objects mentally, help him take full control of another person and direct weak-minded people to cause affliction and ruin.PC System RequirementsRecommendedOS: Windows XP, VISTA, 7Processor: Pentium Core 2 2,6GHz or AMD equivalentMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: NVIDIA 260 GT Series or ATI equivalent with 512MB of Graphics MemoryDirectXÂ®: 9.0cHard Drive: 3 GB HD spaceSound: DX9.0c compatibleExternal Linkshttp://www.shivergames.com/http://lucius.shivergames.com/Twitter: http://twitter.com/#!/shivergames
